text.section:
With the approval of the Secretary, the Veterans' Home Commission may adopt procedures to:
govern itself; and
carry out the responsibilities of the Veterans' Home Commission.

The Commission:
may not incur any expenses without the consent of the Department; and
at each regular meeting of the Commission or more often as it directs, shall submit to the Department a report on any action that the Commission has taken since its last report.

section.section:
The Veterans' Home Commission shall through the Department submit an annual report:
to the Governor; and
subject to § 2-1246 of this article, to the General Assembly.

The annual report shall:
describe the activities of the Commission; and
include any recommendations for furthering the purposes of the Commission.

text.section: As far as practicable, the Veterans' Home Commission shall cooperate with persons and public agencies to carry out the purposes and goals of the Commission and Department.
